abstract: Humor apps for the smartphone offer everything from lowbrow sight gags to wickedly biting comic strips.
snippet: Humor apps for the smartphone offer everything from lowbrow sight gags to wickedly biting comic strips.
lead_paragraph: NEED a good laugh? In 2015, you don’t need to look any further than the numerous funny or silly apps available for your smartphone.

headline.main: Just for Laughs: Fake Mustaches and Cat Translations
headline.print_headline: Just for Laughs: Fake Mustaches and Cat Translations
